DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to estimate the safety and efficacy of PEG-rhG-CSF in patients with lymphoma receiving chemotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: PEG-rhG-CSF in Patients With Lymphoma Receiving Chemotherapy
